inventory_management_general.title: Good but expensive for small retail
inventory_management_general.cons: Too expensive for small stores, complex setup
inventory_management_general.body: The software works well but pricing is aimed at large retailers. Small businesses struggle with the cost.

inventory_management_general.title: Manual counting still required
inventory_management_general.cons: Still need manual shelf checks, no automated detection
inventory_management_general.body: We still have to manually count shelves every day. The system does not detect out-of-stock automatically.
